title: Jacob Rees-Mogg – 2022 Statement that Boris Johnson Will Run for Conservative Leadership
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jacob Rees-Mogg, a supporter of the Boris Johnson campaign, made in an interview to the BBC’s Laura Kuenssberg on 23 October 2022.
content:
I have been speaking to Boris Johnson and clearly he is going to stand as there is a great deal of support for him.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
